item.title: Javascript: Add a month to a date
item.description: We’ve been doing a bit of date manipulation in Javascript on my current project and one of the things that we wanted to do is add 1 month to a given date. We can kind of achieve this using the standard date libraries but it doesn’t work for edge cases. For example, say we want to add one month to January 31st 2009. We would expect one month from this date to be February 28th 2009:
